messages.original: The missile to Sumy was MLRS
Explosion in Pavlohrad. A recon drone was operating
Entered Ukrainian airspace via Kharkiv Oblast
Entered Ukrainian airspace via Kharkiv Oblast
Fires are burning in Zaporizhzhia.   More KABs will impact in 4-5 minutes.
One of the glide-bomb impacts in Zaporizhzhia City was to a warehouse complex at 47.789182, 35.208929. The targets were likely the buildings behind the cameraman in media 2.
One of the glide-bomb impacts in Zaporizhzhia City was to a warehouse complex at 47.789182, 35.208929. The targets were likely the buildings behind the cameraman in media 2.
Another Iskander launch from Voronezh Oblast

Two separate security incidents have occurred in Northern Gaza / Gaza City. 
Israeli media reports that a "Namer" APC was hit by a Russian-made 9M133 Kornet ATGM, resulting in 5 IDF soldiers being wounded, with one in critical condition but with no threat to his life.  
Additionally, small-arms clashes injured one IDF soldier in a separate incident.
Another Iskander launch from Voronezh Oblast
The southern suburbs of Zaporizhzhia City are currently under heavy Russian MLRS fire. The attacks on Zaporizhzhia have increased massively over the past two days.
The southern suburbs of Zaporizhzhia City are currently under heavy Russian MLRS fire. The attacks on Zaporizhzhia have increased massively over the past two days.

Overnight, Zaporizhzhia City came under continued attacks by MLRS and KABs. At least 7 more KAB glide-bombs hit targets in the city limits, and on the outskirts, while MLRS shelling targeted the southern suburbs. Geran-2 drones also flew over the city but did not strike anything as they were transiting north. 
Strengthened Ukrainian air defence in Zaporizhzhia is showing its effects. At least four Gerans have been shot down, along with two glide-bombs. 
Additionally, targets from the previous attacks were identified. The auto-repair shop at 47.82259, 35.14838 was hit, along with the Motor Sich Plant in multiple places. However, electronic warfare seems to be affecting the accuracy of these bombs, as one that intended to hit the auto-repair shop missed by around 40 metres, and another aimed at the Motor Sich plant hit houses around 60 metres away across the street (47.83129, 35.19627).

Overnight, Zaporizhzhia City came under continued attacks by MLRS and KABs. At least 7 more KAB glide-bombs hit targets in the city limits, and on the outskirts, while MLRS shelling targeted the southern suburbs. Geran-2 drones also flew over the city but did not strike anything as they were transiting north. 
Strengthened Ukrainian air defence in Zaporizhzhia is showing its effects. At least four Gerans have been shot down, along with two glide-bombs. 
Additionally, targets from the previous attacks were identified. The auto-repair shop at 47.82259, 35.14838 was hit, along with the Motor Sich Plant in multiple places. However, electronic warfare seems to be affecting the accuracy of these bombs, as one that intended to hit the auto-repair shop missed by around 40 metres, and another aimed at the Motor Sich plant hit houses around 60 metres away across the street (47.83129, 35.19627).

In the Lyman direction, Russian forces continue to advance and have captured the village of Shandryholove.
Russian forces advaced in three areas. In the north, they continued to improve their positions north of Serednje, capturing positions in the grey zone and securing their logistics into the village from the north. They also reached the nearby orchards and captured positions in the adjacent treeline. 
To the south, Russian forces crossed the gulley from Serednje, and captured the small forest and nearby treelines there. From here, they crossed the Nitrius River to the eastern bank, capturing the northern part of Shandryholove. This, plus advances from the north and east allowed for the Russians to establish control over the local school which previously served as Ukraine's main defensive node. Other forces who crossed over the river from southern Shandryholove then helped clear the rest of the village. 
A few hours later, Ukrainian forces re-infiltrated the western part of the village, and after a series of clashes, were pushed back across the river. Additionally, after a series of attempts, Russian forces secured a bridgehead on the western bank of the Nitrius river southwest of Shandryholove, and captured the agricultural complex and nearby treelines.
In the south, Russian forces continued their assault on Derylove. They were able to marginally advance down the road west of the village, allowing for the western houses to be captured. They also secured the rest of the forested areas north of the gulley that runs along the northern edge of the settlement.
+ ~10.96 km¬≤ in favour of Russia.

On the northern flank of Siversk and in the Lyman direction, Russian forces continued their offensive operations and have advanced on a wide front.
Russian forces continued to push west through the Yampil forests and have captured positions within 600 metres of the Zarichne - Yampil Road. They are also continuing to bypass the clearings southwest of Torske and are continuing to infiltrate the northern streets of Yampil near the railway station.
In eastern Yampil, Russian forces were finally able to consolidate after attacks were carried out from the forest to the east and the area of the Ostrich Farm to the northeast. Fighting is now ongoing for the rest of the eastern streets and the centre of the village, which are mostly in the grey zone. 
To the east, Russian forces advanced from the area of the Sererbryanskyi Forest, securing new positions in the forests on the Donetsk side of the regional border. They also crossed the Siverskyi Donets River, establishing control over positions in and around the holiday houses on the Donetsk-Luhansk regional border. 
+ ~6.70 km¬≤ in favour of Russia.
